front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Link Aggregation
front.abstract: Link Aggregation allows parallel full duplex point-to-point links to be used as if they werea single link, and also supports the use of multiple links as a resilient load sharing interconnectbetween multiple nodes in two separately administered networks. This standard defines a MACindependent Link Aggregation capability, and general information relevant to specific to MAC types.
